channel.title: Comments on: Moroccan Meatballs with Chickpeas

item.title: By: Nisha
item.dc:creator: Nisha
item.description: Thanks for a great recipe! Made these the other night to rave reviews from the hubby. I couldnt find any lamb mince so used beef instead, still delicious! Served it on a bed of coucous studded with sultanas and slivered almonds.
item.content:encoded: Thanks for a great recipe! Made these the other night to rave reviews from the hubby. I couldnt find any lamb mince so used beef instead, still delicious! Served it on a bed of coucous studded with sultanas and slivered almonds.

item.title: By: MaryMoh
item.dc:creator: MaryMoh
item.description: Congrats on the win. I heard a lot about the delicacy of Moroccan food. You have proven it. The meatballs look so delicious.
item.content:encoded: Congrats on the win. I heard a lot about the delicacy of Moroccan food. You have proven it. The meatballs look so delicious.

item.title: By: Belle@OohLook
item.dc:creator: Belle@OohLook
item.description: Those are great-looking meatballs! I love that you made them such a uniform size (mine are usually all over the place).
item.content:encoded: Those are great-looking meatballs! I love that you made them such a uniform size (mine are usually all over the place).

item.title: By: Barbara
item.dc:creator: Barbara
item.description: Really unusual recipe! Lamb meatballs in a chickpea sauce! I love it. Can't wait to try it.
item.content:encoded: Really unusual recipe! Lamb meatballs in a chickpea sauce! I love it. Can’t wait to try it.

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: That's exciting to win a giveaway! I like the idea of serving the meatballs with chickpeas.
item.content:encoded: That’s exciting to win a giveaway! I like the idea of serving the meatballs with chickpeas.

item.title: By: Katherine
item.dc:creator: Katherine
item.description: The meatballs looks hearty and delicious. The chickpeas would have added so much texture to the dish. Everyone is on the meatball bandwagon. I love meatballs.
item.content:encoded: The meatballs looks hearty and delicious. The chickpeas would have added so much texture to the dish. Everyone is on the meatball bandwagon. I love meatballs.

item.title: By: Juliana
item.dc:creator: Juliana
item.description: Oh! These meatballs look yummie, like that you baked them...great sauce to go with it :-)
item.content:encoded: Oh! These meatballs look yummie, like that you baked them…great sauce to go with it ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Simon
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description: This looks real nice. Very much love the "meatiness" of chickpeas so I could imagine how well these went with the rest of the dish :)
item.content:encoded: This looks real nice. Very much love the “meatiness” of chickpeas so I could imagine how well these went with the rest of the dish ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Rilsta
item.dc:creator: Rilsta
item.description:
Aww, thanks for the mention Anita! :)
Great recipe! I never thought of baking meatballs - I always fry them! And I never thought of soaking the bread in milk first. I normally just crumb them and add the dried crumbs!
item.content:encoded:
Aww, thanks for the mention Anita! ðŸ™‚

Great recipe! I never thought of baking meatballs – I always fry them! And I never thought of soaking the bread in milk first. I normally just crumb them and add the dried crumbs!

item.title: By: lisa (dandysugar)
item.dc:creator: lisa (dandysugar)
item.description: Congrats! Looks like a great kitchen tool! And the meatballs looks so delicious. I love the spices in this recipe. Smoky, sweet and delicious!
item.content:encoded: Congrats! Looks like a great kitchen tool! And the meatballs looks so delicious. I love the spices in this recipe. Smoky, sweet and delicious!
